info.headline: Flood Advisory issued August 4 at 2:39AM ChST until August 4 at 8:00AM ChST by NWS Tiyan GU
info.description:
* WHAT...Urban and small stream flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected.
* WHERE...Guam, Rota, Saipan and Tinian.
* WHEN...Until 800 AM ChST.
* IMPACTS...Flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. Water over roadways. Overflowing poor drainage areas. Ponding of water in urban or other areas is occurring or is imminent.
* ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 236 AM ChST, Doppler radar and satellite indicated areas of heavy rain developing over the Marianas. This is causing urban and small stream flooding. Between 0.5 and 1 inch of rain has fallen. - Additional rainfall amounts of 2 to 4 inches are expected over the area. This additional rain will result in minor flooding. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Dededo, Tamuning, Yigo, Mangilao, Chalan Pago-Ordot, Barrigada, Yona, Garapan, Hagatna Heights, Dandan, Andersen AFB, Talofofo, Mongmong-Toto-Maite, Sinajana, Inarajan, Asan, Merizo, Piti, China Town and Santa Rita. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction:
Turn around, don't drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding.
Be aware of your surroundings and do not drive on flooded roads.

parameter.value: FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 AM CHST THIS MORNING
